query.name: insert
query.statement: INSERT INTO <TABLE/>(<FIELDS/>) VALUES(<VALUES/>) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE <FIELD name='total'/> = ${total}

query.name: find-all-by-transaction-date
insert
query.statement: INSERT INTO <TABLE/>(<FIELDS/>) VALUES(<VALUES/>) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE <FIELD name='creation-date'/> = NOW()

query.name: find-all-by-domain-and-date
find-all-distinct-by-date
